title._content: [Dr. Henry Alexander Murray, Jr., house, 129 East 69th Street, New York, New York. (LOC)

description._content: Johnston, Frances Benjamin,, 1864-1952,, photographer. [Dr. Henry Alexander Murray, Jr., house, 129 East 69th Street, New York, New York. View from terrace to sandbox] [1922] 1 photograph : glass lantern slide, hand-colored ; 3.25 x 4 in. Notes: Site History. Landscape: Clarence Fowler. Other: This garden was awarded second prize medal for a city garden at the 1922 City Gardens Club of New York City photograph exhibition at the New York Camera Club. Today: House and garden not extant. On slide (handwritten): "Murray." Slide for lecturing on city and suburban gardens. Title, date, and subject information provided by Sam Watters, 2011. Forms part of: Garden and historic house lecture series in the Frances Benjamin Johnston Collection (Library of Congress). Published in Gardens for a Beautiful America / Sam Watters. New York: Acanthus Press, 2012. Plate 170. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.16663 Call Number: LC-J717-X107- 19
